excerpt: This city beach features lifeguards, public toilets, showers, volleyball & beach bars.
detail_description: Llevant Beach is the longest natural beach in Salou, located in the city center and bordered by the Jaume promenade. The promenade is lined with palm trees and famous dancing fountains, making it a major tourist attraction. Along the promenade, there are various leisure facilities, stores, terraces, beach bars, restaurants suitable for all ages. The beach holds a Blue Flag award and provides services such as sun loungers, umbrellas, showers and lifeguards.
name: Llevant Beach
address: Spain

excerpt: Water park with a wave pool, a lazy river, water slides & an indoor area with kids' attractions.
detail_description: Caribe Aquatic Park is part of the PortAventura World complex, offering a Caribbean-themed water park experience. With a wave pool, lazy river, water slides, and indoor kids' attractions, it's perfect for family fun. Set in the Costa Dorada in Catalonia, this popular tourist destination also features PortAventura Park and Ferrari Land. The park spans over 50,000 hectares with various swimming pools and attractions. It's an ideal summer day getaway for leisure and excitement.
name: Caribe Aquatic Park
address: Avinguda de l'Alcade Pere Molas, s/n, 43480 Vila-seca, Tarragona, Spain

excerpt: Ferrari-themed amusement park with rides, an interactive gallery on the brand & restaurants.
detail_description: Ferrari Land is a thrilling Ferrari-themed amusement park located in Salou, Catalonia. The park features exhilarating rides, an interactive gallery showcasing the iconic brand, and a variety of restaurants to enjoy. Visitors staying at PortAventura Hotel Caribe - Theme Park Tickets Included can easily access Ferrari Land along with other nearby attractions. The upscale hotel offers luxurious amenities including an indoor pool, spa tub, sauna, and complimentary wireless internet access.
name: Ferrari Land
address: Avinguda de l'Alcade Pere Molas, s/n, 43480 Vila-seca, Tarragona, Spain

detail_description: Salou, located on the Costa Dorada, is renowned for its exceptional dining scene. The Gran Palas Experience offers a diverse range of culinary options that blend traditional Catalan and Spanish cuisine with international flavors. Additionally, Sanguli Camping & Resort in Salou has been nominated as the best campsite in Europe for families, while Tamarit Beach Resort was recognized as the top-rated accommodation. These accolades highlight Salou's appeal as a top destination for both gastronomy and family-friendly experiences.
name: Salou
address: 43840, Tarragona, Spain

detail_description: Passeig de Jaume I is a vibrant street featuring modern architectural marvels such as the Cal Bonet tower and a monument honoring King Jaume, who commenced his conquest of Mallorca from Salou. These contemporary structures add an intriguing contrast to the historical charm of the area.
name: Passeig de Jaume I
address: 43840 Salou, Tarragona, Spain

detail_description: PortAventura Park is a world-building theme park divided into five areas representing different continents, each with buildings and rides reflecting the culture of the country. The park features traditional entertainment facilities, roller coasters, rapids, 4D cinemas, and more. With over 1 million square meters of stunning landscape and 30,000 plant species, it offers a captivating experience.
name: PortAventura Park
address: Avinguda de l'Alcade Pere Molas, s/n, 43480 Vila-seca, Tarragona, Spain

excerpt: Salou is a resort town along Spain’s northeastern Costa Daurada, in the Tarragona province. Its beaches range from small, craggy coves to the busy main Llevant and Ponent strips. It's popular for windsurfing, sailing and golf. The Coastal Path, once used by fishermen like the one immortalized in a nearby statue, is now known for its sunrise and sunset views.
detail_description: Salou, a resort town on Spain's Costa Daurada, offers diverse beaches from secluded coves to bustling strips. It's a hotspot for windsurfing, sailing, and golf. The Coastal Path provides stunning sunrise and sunset views. As the capital of Costa Daurada, Salou boasts over 4.3 miles of Blue Flag beaches and a vibrant culinary scene. Visitors can explore landmarks like Torre Vella fortress and enjoy the renowned PortAventura World theme park.
name: Salou
address: Tarragona, Spain

excerpt: Adventure park featuring paintball, zip-lines, mini-golf, archery with foam-tipped arrows & more.
detail_description: Bosc Aventura Salou is an adventure park that offers a wide range of activities for visitors of all ages. From treetop adventures to ground-level fun like paintball and climbing walls, there's something for everyone. The park opened in 2011 and boasts 8,000 square meters of green area with zip lines and paintball. Visitors can also enjoy obstacle courses, zip lines, mini-golf, archery with foam-tipped arrows, and more.
name: Bosc Aventura Salou
address: Carrer de Barbastre, 15, 43840 Salou, Tarragona, Spain

excerpt: Seaside theme park with restaurants, state-of-the-art roller coasters, water slides & live shows.
detail_description: Located in Tarragona, Spain, PortAventura World is a seaside theme park that offers an array of attractions for visitors. The park is divided into six thematic areas: the Mediterranean, Polynesia, China, Mexico, the Far West and Sesamo Aventura. Each area features rides and shows related to its theme. From state-of-the-art roller coasters like Dragon Khan in China to live entertainment and water slides, there's something for everyone at this popular European destination.
name: PortAventura World
address: Av. Pere Molas, s/n, 43480 Vila-seca, Tarragona, Spain

excerpt: 16th-century stone defense tower now serving as a gallery for paintings & artifacts.
detail_description: The Torre Vella - Galeria de pintures i altres, also known as the Old Tower of Salou, is a 16th-century stone defense tower that has been repurposed into a gallery for paintings and artifacts. Initially built in 1530 to protect the city from pirate attacks, it now stands as a cultural center hosting various exhibitions and events. Visitors can explore the premises free of charge and admire a collection of paintings by 20th-century artists.
name: Torre Vella - Galeria de pintures i altres
address: Via Aurèlia, 0, 43840 Salou, Tarragona, Spain

excerpt: Cambrils is a coastal town in the comarca of Baix Camp, province of Tarragona, Catalonia, Spain. The town is near the tourist town Salou and is frequently visited by those travelling by air using Reus Airport. Wikipedia.
detail_description: Cambrils is a charming coastal town located in the province of Tarragona, Catalonia, Spain. Situated near popular tourist destinations like Salou and easily accessible from Reus Airport, it attracts many visitors seeking a relaxing seaside getaway.
name: Cambrils
address: Tarragona, Spain

excerpt: Aquatic amusement park featuring giant water slides, swimming pools, marine life shows & eateries.
detail_description: Aquopolis Costa Daurada in La Pineda Salou is a thrilling aquatic amusement park offering an array of attractions for the whole family. From giant water slides to swimming pools and marine life shows, there's something for everyone. The park also features chill-out areas where you can relax and rent loungers or floats. With its numerous restaurants, kiosks, and shops, Aquopolis Costa Daurada promises a fun-filled day out.
name: Aquopolis Costa Daurada - La Pineda Salou
address: Passeig de Pau Casals, 65, 43480 La Pineda, Tarragona, Spain

detail_description: La Siesta Salou Resort & Camping is a family-friendly campsite located in the coastal town of Salou. It offers bungalows with well-equipped kitchens, bedrooms, and living rooms. The resort features four outdoor swimming pools and a children's playground with a small water park. Additionally, guests can enjoy the nearby beach and restaurants. For those seeking relaxation, there is also a full-service spa on-site.
name: La Siesta Salou Resort & Camping
address: Carrer del Nord, 37, 43840 Salou, Tarragona, Spain

detail_description: House of Illusion is a must-visit in Salou, offering a mesmerizing evening filled with parlor magic, comedy, manipulation, mind reading, and world-class illusions. Voted as the number 1 thing to do in Salou on TripAdvisor, this mystery theater show provides an unforgettable experience. The spacious bar area welcomes guests with entertaining parlor magic before leading them into a beautifully decorated candlelit theatre for a stunning spectacle.
name: House Of Illusion
address: Calle Espigó del Moll, s/n, 43840 Salou, Tarragona, Spain

excerpt: Popular amusement park with a variety of kid-friendly rides, a steam engine & water slides.
detail_description: SesameAdventure is a popular amusement park that offers a variety of kid-friendly rides, including a steam engine and water slides. One of its main attractions is the SesamoAventura, where visitors can meet Elmo and other friendly animals while enjoying a fun ride. This part of the park is highly recommended for children, offering smaller rides and entertaining shows that appeal to both younger and older kids.
name: SesameAdventure
address: Av. del Batlle Pere Molas, Km. 2, 43840 Salou, Tarragona, Spain

detail_description: Karting Salou is a popular attraction in the area, offering races suitable for both young adults and children. The circuit spans 900 meters for adults and 300 meters for children aged 4 to 13. One of its main draws is the Bungee Rocket, which launches two people to a height of 90 meters at a speed of 180 km/h in just 1.3 seconds.
name: Karting Salou
address: C-14, km 0,196, 43840 Salou, Tarragona, Spain

detail_description: Cap de Salou is a stunning coastal destination known for its picturesque beaches nestled within rocky landscapes. Visitors can explore a variety of charming coves such as Cala Crancs, Cala Font, and Cala Penya Tallada, each offering unique natural beauty and opportunities for relaxation.
name: Cap de Salou
address: 43840 Salou, Tarragona, Spain

detail_description: Cap de Salou is a stunning tourist spot with five beautiful beaches and coves to explore. The area features a picturesque walking path, some of which are wild and rugged, providing an adventurous experience for visitors. While it can get crowded during the summer months, the natural beauty of the beaches and coves makes it worth a visit. Cap de Salou offers a quieter alternative to Salou, making it an ideal destination for those seeking spectacular natural scenery.
name: Cap de Salou
address: Spain

name: Little train stop - Parc de Salou
address: 43840 Salou, Tarragona, Spain

detail_description: Salou is conveniently located near several airports, including Reus, Barcelona El Prat, and Lleida-Alguaire. The closest airport is Reus, which is only 5.2 miles away. Travelers can reach Salou from Reus in just 15 minutes by car. Alternatively, Barcelona El Prat Airport is about 51 miles away and the journey to Salou takes approximately 1 hour and 10 minutes.
name: Salou
address: 43840 Salou, Tarragona, Spain

detail_description: Fountain in Salou is a must-see attraction, offering a mesmerizing water and light show at the city center. The display features fountains dancing to music with stunning visual effects. It's a captivating experience that brings joy and tranquility as the pleasant sound of water cuts off the city noise, while the sun shining on the spray adds to its charm.
name: Fountain
address: Carrer Via Augusta, 36, 43840 Salou, Tarragona, Spain

excerpt: Large beachfront jetted fountain built in 1973, popular for its light & sound show at night.
detail_description: Font Lluminosa, also known as the Luminous Fountain, is a captivating beachfront attraction located at the end of Paseo Jaume in Salou. Created by engineer Carles Buigas in 1973, this jetted fountain offers a mesmerizing light and sound show from Easter to November. Although recent droughts have affected its regular shows, when operational, it provides a romantic and enchanting experience for visitors.
name: Font Lluminosa
address: Carrer de Carles Buïgas, 1, 43840 Salou, Tarragona, Spain

detail_description: Salou Park is a serene and picturesque destination in the city, offering well-maintained gardens, playgrounds, and shaded areas for families and nature enthusiasts to enjoy. The park is home to a variety of attractions including a pond where visitors can spot tortoises freely roaming around. Additionally, it provides a peaceful escape from the bustling streets with lush vegetation, charming bars, and talented caricature artists creating unique artworks.
name: Salou Park
address: Carrer de Barbastre, 15, 43840 Salou, Tarragona, Spain

name: Nàutic Parc
address: Plaça Comunitats Autònomes, s/n, 43840 Salou, Tarragona, Spain

detail_description: The golf course INFINITUM Golf - LAKES is a world-class facility with well-maintained greens and fairways, offering an enjoyable experience for both beginners and experienced golfers. The staff are always friendly and helpful, making it the perfect place to relax after a day of play. Prices are reasonable, making it an ideal option for anyone looking to enjoy a round of golf in lovely surroundings.
name: INFINITUM Golf - LAKES
address: Carrer del Camí del Racó, s/n, 43481 Vila-seca, Tarragona, Spain

excerpt: Popular roller coaster with 8 loops going at more than 110 km/h, located in PortAventura Park.
name: Dragon Khan
address: Av. Pere Molas, s/n, 43480 Vila-seca, Tarragona, Spain

excerpt: High-speed roller coaster with steep drops, weightless sections & panoramic views of the park.
name: Shambhala
address: Av. Pere Molas, 43840 Vila-seca, Tarragona, Spain

detail_description: Cala Crancs is a picturesque beach located near the Salou lighthouse and surrounded by lush vegetation. It can be accessed by car or via the coastal path from Salou, offering a serene and natural setting for visitors to enjoy. The area boasts a total of 9 beaches, including Cala Crancs, where one can bask in the morning sun while experiencing moderate temperatures.
name: Cala Crancs
address: Spain

name: Vela de Salou
address: 43840 Salou, Tarragona, Spain

excerpt: Popular small sandy beach located in a cove in a residential area, featuring swimming & sunbathing.
detail_description: Platja dels Capellans is a popular small sandy beach nestled in a cove within a residential area, just half a kilometer away from the center of Salou. This 200-meter-long cove boasts golden sand and calm, clear waters, making it a favorite among tourists and locals for swimming and sunbathing.
name: Platja dels Capellans
address: Spain

excerpt: Backed by a pine forest, this popular beach offers calm swimming waters, a bar, rentals & services.
detail_description: Llarga Beach, nestled just north of Tarragona, is a serene escape that beautifully combines natural beauty with essential amenities. Surrounded by a lush pine forest, this beach boasts calm and inviting waters perfect for swimming. Visitors can enjoy various services including sun lounger rentals and a beach bar to enhance their experience. The area is well-equipped with facilities like bathrooms and showers, making it an ideal spot for families or those seeking comfort while enjoying the sun.
name: Llarga Beach
address: Spain

detail_description: Playa de Ponent is a fantastic beach destination located in Salou, offering miles of clean and tidy golden sand. The beach provides ample space for visitors to relax and enjoy various activities such as volleyball, football, and leisurely walks along the picturesque promenade lined with pine trees. With plenty of sunbeds, beach bars, and facilities like toilets and showers available, it's an ideal spot for families to unwind and have fun.
name: Playa de Ponent
address: Passeig de Miramar, 42, 43840 Salou, Tarragona, Spain

detail_description: Playa Dels Llenguadets is a hidden gem nestled beneath Punta de Porroig, offering a quiet escape from the bustling Salou town beaches. Accessible via stairs or a cliff-side path, this golden-sand beach boasts clear waters and a tranquil atmosphere. While lacking facilities, lifeguards ensure safety. Despite its recent popularity, it remains less crowded than other beaches in the area. Visitors recommend bringing their own amenities for a relaxing day by the sea.
name: Playa Dels Llenguadets
address: Spain

name: Escape Salou
address: Carrer de València, 100, 43840 Salou, Tarragona, Spain

detail_description: The stunning Santa Maria del Mar church in Barcelona's Born district is widely considered to be the city's most exquisite cathedral. It stands out for its gothic masterpiece architecture and unique spaciousness, which is uncommon for medieval buildings. Revered as the "peoples cathedral," it was funded partly by the church but constructed by the local community, particularly the dockworkers who transported large stones from Montjuic mountain quarry.
name: Parròquia Santa Maria del Mar
address: Carrer de l'Església, 22, 43840 Salou, Tarragona, Spain

detail_description: The children's playground in the heart of the city is truly remarkable. It offers a wide range of entertainment options for kids, ensuring they have an enjoyable time. With various play areas suitable for different age groups, it caters to children of all ages. This park is perfect for youngsters to release their energy and have fun in a safe environment. Additionally, it is aesthetically pleasing with its beautiful surroundings.
name: Children playground
address: Plaça del Carrilet, 2, 43840 Salou, Tarragona, Spain

detail_description: Vil·la romana de Barenys is an exquisite destination teeming with beauty and charm. This tourist attraction captivates visitors with its splendid architecture and captivating ambiance. Nestled in a picturesque setting, this place offers a delightful glimpse into the rich historical legacy of the Roman era. Immerse yourself in the captivating tales echoed by its ancient ruins, which stand as testaments to a bygone civilization's grandeur.
name: Vil·la romana de Barenys
address: Avinguda D' Antoni Gaudí, 27, 43840 Salou, Tarragona, Spain

name: QUANTUM ESCAPE
address: Carrer de l'Església, 9, 43840 Salou, Tarragona, Spain

detail_description: Vinoteca de Salou, a wine store operated by Wine Palace, offers an extensive array of wines and spirits. With a vast selection and knowledgeable staff, customers have praised this establishment for its impeccable recommendations. The sommelier's expertise in suggesting the Marco Abella Loidana Priorat was particularly impressive. This place is highly recommended due to its large variety of wines and liquors, as well as the friendly and helpful service provided by the staff.
name: Vinoteca de Salou by Wine Palace
address: Via Roma, 26, 43840 Salou, Tarragona, Spain

excerpt: Scenic cove with dramatic, vegetation-topped cliffs & a small, sandy beach for sunbathing.
detail_description: Cala Penya Tallada is a charming and secluded cove in Salou, surrounded by fragrant pine trees and lush vegetation. With its 125-meter length and 10-meter width, this picturesque spot offers a small sandy beach for sunbathing. Despite being one of the best beaches in Salou, it remains relatively unknown to tourists, ensuring a peaceful and uncrowded experience.
name: Cala Penya Tallada
address: Ctra. de la Costa, 18, 43840 Salou, Tarragona, Spain

detail_description: Casa Bonet is a beautiful historic residence located along the elegant seafront of Salou. The building stands out with its notable architecture, surrounded by a charming wall and lush garden. Its traditional Andalusian decorative tiles add to its striking appearance. While visitors can only admire it from the outside, Casa Bonet is a colorful and impressive sight to behold while strolling along the promenade lined with palm trees.
name: Casa Bonet
address: Passeig de Jaume I, 2, 43840 Salou, Tarragona, Spain

detail_description: Armonia is a charming wine shop located in Tarragona, offering personalized wine tastings by the lovely Marina. Visitors can sample and purchase a variety of wines from different national origins such as Rioja, Ribera del Duero, Priorat, Bierzo, and Toro. Additionally, the shop provides an array of oils to taste and various cheeses and hams to indulge in. The friendly staff offers informative guidance on the products available for tasting.
name: Armonia
address: Carrer Major, 56, 43840 Salou, Tarragona, Spain

detail_description: Masia Catalana, built in 1974, is a themed architectural complex offering insight into the lives of Catalan peasant farmers from ancient times. The park authentically recreates ancient settlements and showcases traditional ways of life, including kitchen utensils and farming tools used centuries ago. Additionally, the site hosts a craft market open daily during specific hours. Located near Salou's municipal park, Masia Catalana features typical old houses found in Catalonia's countryside and villages.
name: Masia Catalana
address: Carrer de Ramon Llull, 18, 43840 Salou, Tarragona, Spain

name: Escultura Coche de carreras
address: 34FV+68Q, 43840 Salou, Tarragona, Spain

name: Monumento al Pescador
address: 43840, Tarragona, Spain

detail_description: Platja Els Pilons, located in Salou on the Costa Dorada, is a popular resort known for its long golden beach and nearby attractions like PortAventura, one of Europe's largest theme parks. The beach offers a great spot for families to enjoy activities like building sandcastles during the day and taking leisurely strolls at night. Visitors can also experience the lively atmosphere with fireworks, beachfront bars, and a beautiful view of the full moon.
name: Platja Els pilons
address: Passeig de Jaume I, 14, 43840 Salou, Tarragona, Spain

detail_description: Salou is a charming destination with plenty to offer, especially in September when the weather is still delightful and the beaches are less crowded. One of the highlights during this time is the medieval Jaume parties that take place in Salou. The promenade features a bronze tribute to King Jaume I, offering a great spot for capturing memorable photos. Additionally, street art in the form of a bronze sculpture depicts King James and three children playing around him, created by artist Natalia Ferre.
name: King Jaume I
address: 43840 Salou, Tarragona, Spain

name: Font Cibernètica
address: Passeig de Jaume I, 1, 43840 Salou, Tarragona, Spain

name: Homenatge a la Dona
address: Plaça del Carrilet, 2, 43840 Salou, Tarragona, Spain

detail_description: The urban sculpture "Escultura urbana “Ball de Bastons”" is a life-size representation located in a small square behind the Church. It beautifully captures the popular culture of the village and is made of bronze by artist Natalie Ferre.
name: Escultura urbana “Ball de Bastons”
address: Carrer de Ponent, 13, 43840 Salou, Tarragona, Spain
